Comments_List: I really appreciate learning from the other senior EVST majors and their research! The class strengthens the EVST which has been so enjoyable. This course gives some structure to the thesis writing process which is good.
You have to take it, but it's fun! the community in EVST is nice and the colloquium is a good way to get your thesis moving along.
This course motivated me to actually work on my thesis via regular deadlines.

This course gives some structure to the thesis writing process which is good. Sometimes it is really low-energy because everyone has to be there. I wish the assignments were more lengthy at the beginning so that even before finals period we could have had most of our 20 pages done.
Make more reasonable deadlines for us.
Some of the assignments felt a bit like busy work. It might've been nice to have deadlines more tailored to each specific project.
Yes, you have to take it but you will enjoy it.
It's mandatory so it doesn't matter if I recommend it, but ya it's lit. Take it with Prof Doolittle, she's amazing!
It think this course has value, and would recommend.
I would encourage any EVST senior to pursue a thesis. It's a lot of work, but incredibly rewarding - you can really leave your undergrad career as an expert on a specific topic.
